msg: 1. A new set of interfaces for datatype validators (DTD) and simple types (Schema);

author: neilg
msg: when a parser receives an XMLParseException that is not wrapping another exception, throw a SAXParseException to the application instead of a SAXExcption so that the application can extract locator information if it chooses to do so.
